desc: 異界ヴィランシルの永久凍土層の調査時に発見された鉱石

dictionary.lore: An icy ore discovered in the permafrost layer of the world of Vilanciel. It is created throughout an almost eternal period of time under very precise temperatures and pressure. Not only does it boast of great endurance, but its bluish glow never fades either, regardless of how many times it has been tempered. This, along with the secret powers the ore has been rumored to hide since ancient times, have made it a material coveted by researchers everywhere.

name: 氷零石
